mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, password, email, gender, join_date, role) VALUES (#{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gender}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), IFNULL(#{role}, 'USER'));
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = IFNULL(#{name}, name), password = IFNULL(#{password}, password), gender = IFNULL(#{gender}, gender) WHERE id = #{id};
